speech: I've been looking everywhere for an ITEM like this. I need it to do something... Do you have it?
Huh? This is a shop? It looks more like a pigsty. Anyway, I need ITEM.
Hi... A friend needs ITEM, ITEM, ITEM, ITEM, and ITEM for a situation.
Ah, the fates have brought me to your door. Do you have an ITEM to fulfill my destiny?
I could've sworn I had an ITEM yesterday, but now it's gone. Could you help a forgetful soul?
They say you're the best in the business. Can you prove it by selling me an ITEM?
I'm in a bit of a hurry. Just give me an ITEM and I'll be on my way.
I need an ITEM, and fast! My potion's brewing, and it's about to explode!
I've traveled across lands and seas for this very moment... Do you have the ITEM I seek?
ITEM, ITEM, ITEM... My precious collection is missing one last piece. Do you have it?
If I don't get an ITEM right now, my mother-in-law will turn me into a frog. Please help!
I need an ITEM, but don't try to swindle me. I know the market price.
Greetings! Could you please assist me with an ITEM? It's for a... delicate matter.
The last shopkeeper tried to sell me a fake ITEM. You wouldn't do that, right?
ITEM? Oh, yes, I need it for... something important. How much?
I've heard whispers in the wind about your shop. Do you have an ITEM that might pique my interest?
An ITEM, you say? I'll take one. Make sure it's not cursed this time.
Do you have any items that sparkle? Maybe an ITEM for a discerning eye like mine?
Straight to the point. I need an ITEM, and I'm not leaving without it.
My cauldron is bubbling and the stars are aligned. All I need now is an ITEM.
This shop smells... interesting. Do you have an ITEM I could take off your hands?
I don't care about the price, just get me an ITEM and be quick about it.
The elders spoke of a place where one could find an ITEM. Is this the place?
I'll be blunt: I need an ITEM, and you look like someone who can get it for me.
An ITEM, my good shopkeeper! Preferably one that doesn't explode... this time.
The road's been long, and my patience is short. Do you have an ITEM for sale?
My horse has been acting strange... Do you have an ITEM that could help?
I need an ITEM, but not just any ITEM. It has to be... special. Can you help?
My rival mentioned this shop. I don't see the appeal. But I do need an ITEM.
I've got a riddle for you: What do I need that starts with 'I' and ends with 'TEM'?
Let's make this quick. I need an ITEM before anyone else gets their hands on it.
My collection's almost complete, but I'm missing an ITEM. Do you have it?
I'm here for an ITEM. And don't even think about overcharging me.
Rumor has it, you've got the finest ITEM in the land. Care to prove it?
My grandmother used to have an ITEM like this. Nostalgia's a funny thing, isn't it?
I've got a sneaking suspicion you're hiding an ITEM I need. Care to sell it?
This shop is... cozy. Do you happen to have an ITEM in stock?
The stars have led me here. Surely you have the ITEM I seek.
I'm not sure what an ITEM is, but I was told to ask for one.
ITEM? Yes, I'll take one. And no funny business, got it?
I was just passing through... Do you have an ITEM that catches the eye?
I require an ITEM. Don't ask why. It's... complicated.
The market was out of ITEMs. You're my last hope.
I've got gold and I need an ITEM. Let's do business.
I had a dream about an ITEM. Do you believe in fate?
I'm in desperate need of an ITEM. Can you help?
I've got a good feeling about this shop. Do you have an ITEM?
Ah, the scent of commerce. I'm here for an ITEM.
I've been saving up for an ITEM. Show me what you've got!
The journey's been long, but I'm here for an ITEM. Let's see it.
